text: fighters from a local Shia militia are
going home at last they're returning to
Amelie after the long siege the road is
open but it's not secure our guides say
there are snipers hidden in the villages
around we're skirting round Amelie to
the east and trying to come at it from
there because over off to our right
there are still pockets of Islamic state
resistance Amelie is a small shear town
surrounded by Sunni villages local
fighters held out against the Islamist
for more than two months but it took an
unlikely alliance of iranian-backed Shia
militias Iraqi military and American
airpower to finally break the siege Ali
is looking for his family but they're
not at home he's had virtually no news
of his elderly parents since the siege
began finally he finds his mother at a
relative's then father is reunited with
the son I haven't seen my son for three
months my son I'm his mother they
shelled us from all sides day after day
they shelled my home the defense of AM
elite was a collective effort boys as
young as 10 years old like Abdullah have
been forced to grow up fast or than a
thousand rockets and missiles have
landed on our town they use tanks
against ters and heavy weapons and so
all of these heroes here even the
children were carrying Kalashnikovs and
organizing logistics everyone in this
town is still on a war
amid the euphoria of victory even the
grannies fancy a pop at the Islamic
state
amid the palpable sense of joy at the
reunification of families and relief
that the siege is broken there's still
anxiety here on the streets of family
we're told we shouldn't venture too far
over that way because there are still
the potential for snipers and shootings
here and this is a town that's only just
beginning to come back to life and
eventually when the firewood ran out
jameelah stoked her bread oven with
powder then the grain stores dwindled
then she began digging bore holes
looking for fresh water and so the
appearance today of a truckload of ice
felt almost like a miracle emily has
been Iraq's biggest victory so far
against an opponent that has swept
through the country with terrifying
speed but this is just one small town
and the Islamic state is still a
powerful force
Gabriel gatehouse BBC news in Amelie
